attributes.contentHtml:
You can maybe (just maybe) DM an Admin on the reason you were banned instead of making assumptions and making a whole thread for one little thing.

(I'm not associated with them or know them but its just bit of common sense before jumping to conclusions )

attributes.bio: bullying 5 year old host owners isn’t just a hobby, it’s a lifestyle, a reason to breathe, an escape from this cruel world filled with thieves. It’s art, the first gift you open on xmas /j

attributes.title: Lawliet.Host™ banned me for no reason....
